articles.author: Lisa Richwine
articles.title: Shannen Doherty, '90210' and 'Charmed' actress, dies at 53 - Reuters
articles.description: American actor Shannen Doherty, best known for her role as high school student Brenda Walsh on hit 1990s television drama "Beverly Hills, 90210," has died at age 53 following a years-long battle with cancer.

articles.author: Sahil Bakshi
articles.title: Lionel Messi Shatters 'World Record' Of Titles As Argentina Clinch Copa America Title - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Lionel Messi won his 45th team trophy as Argentina defeated Colombia 1-0 in Copa America 2024 final.
articles.content: Widely considered the 'GOAT', Lionel Messi bagged his third consecutive international trophy as Argentina defeated Colombia 1-0 in the Copa America 2024 final. The tournament almost ended on a sorry … [+2019 chars]

articles.author: Zack Beauchamp
articles.title: America is not ready for what comes next - Vox.com
articles.description: After a bloodied Donald Trump was rushed offstage at a Pennsylvania rally, America braced for fallout. We’re still not prepared.
articles.content:
Someone just attempted to assassinate former President Donald Trump. We dont know who, and we dont know why, but we know they came terribly close to succeeding.
We should all be terrified about what… [+3871 chars]
